metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0606 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In drm_syncobj_handle_to_fd of drm_syncobj.c, there is a possible use after free due to incorrect refcounting. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-168034487

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
